Vue.SQLSERVER: WITH ORDEREDREPRES AS ( SELECT R.idtiers, MIN(R.principal*10000 + R.idcompteur) AS reprorder FROM TIREPRES R GROUP BY R.idtiers ) SELECT R.idtiers, R.idcompteur FROM TIREPRES R JOIN ORDEREDREPRES O ON R.idtiers=O.idtiers AND R.principal*10000 + R.idcompteur = O.reprorder
Vue.ORACLE: WITH ORDEREDREPRES AS ( SELECT R.idtiers, MIN(R.principal*10000 + R.idcompteur) AS reprorder FROM TIREPRES R GROUP BY R.idtiers ) SELECT R.idtiers, R.idcompteur FROM TIREPRES R JOIN ORDEREDREPRES O ON R.idtiers=O.idtiers AND R.principal*10000 + R.idcompteur = O.reprorder

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT ORGA.* , DFI.* FROM ( SELECT T.lbdoss as orga_nom, TA.nomville as orga_ville, TA.numvoie as orga_numvoie, TA.compnumvoie as orga_compnumvoie, TA.rue1 as orga_rue1, TA.rue2 as orga_rue2, TA.rue3 as orga_rue3, TA.rue4 as orga_rue4, TA.boitepost as orga_boitepost, TA.codepostal as orga_postal, TR.titre as dg_titre, TR.nom as dg_nom, TR.prenom as dg_prenom, TG.abregenre as dg_genre, TG.lbgenre as dg_libgenre FROM DOMTIERS T inner join INACTEUR A on (A.idtiers = T.iddoss and A.idacteur = 'OPH') left join TIADRESSE TA on (TA.idtiers = T.iddoss) left join TIREPRES TR on (TR.idtiers = T.iddoss and TR.idcompteur = 1) left join TIGENRE TG on (TG.idgenre = TR.genre) ) ORGA left join ( SELECT T.lbdoss as dfi_lib, TR.titre as dfi_titre, T.lbsecond as dfi_libdir, TR.nom as dfi_nom, TR.prenom dfi_prenom, TG.abregenre as dfi_genre, TG.lbgenre as dfi_libgenre, T.idref as dfi_ref, TR.telephone as telephone, TR.adremail as adremail FROM DOMTIERS T inner join INACTEUR A on (A.idtiers = T.iddoss and ((A.idacteur = 'OPH_DIRFI') OR (A.idacteur = 'OPH-DIRFI'))) left join TIREPRES TR on (TR.idtiers = T.iddoss and TR.idcompteur = 1) left join TIGENRE TG on (TG.idgenre = coalesce(TR.genre,T.idgenre)) ) DFI on (1=1)
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT ORGA.* , DFI.* FROM ( SELECT T.lbdoss as orga_nom, TA.nomville as orga_ville, TA.numvoie as orga_numvoie, TA.compnumvoie as orga_compnumvoie, TA.rue1 as orga_rue1, TA.rue2 as orga_rue2, TA.rue3 as orga_rue3, TA.rue4 as orga_rue4, TA.boitepost as orga_boitepost, TA.codepostal as orga_postal, TR.titre as dg_titre, TR.nom as dg_nom, TR.prenom as dg_prenom, TG.abregenre as dg_genre, TG.lbgenre as dg_libgenre FROM DOMTIERS T inner join INACTEUR A on (A.idtiers = T.iddoss and A.idacteur = 'OPH') left join TIADRESSE TA on (TA.idtiers = T.iddoss) left join TIREPRES TR on (TR.idtiers = T.iddoss and TR.idcompteur = 1) left join TIGENRE TG on (TG.idgenre = TR.genre) ) ORGA left join ( SELECT T.lbdoss as dfi_lib, TR.titre as dfi_titre, T.lbsecond as dfi_libdir, TR.nom as dfi_nom, TR.prenom dfi_prenom, TG.abregenre as dfi_genre, TG.lbgenre as dfi_libgenre, T.idref as dfi_ref, TR.telephone as telephone, TR.adremail as adremail FROM DOMTIERS T inner join INACTEUR A on (A.idtiers = T.iddoss and ((A.idacteur = 'OPH_DIRFI') OR (A.idacteur = 'OPH-DIRFI'))) left join TIREPRES TR on (TR.idtiers = T.iddoss and TR.idcompteur = 1) left join TIGENRE TG on (TG.idgenre = coalesce(TR.genre,T.idgenre)) ) DFI on (1=1)

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT T.iddoss as idtiers,TA.idadresse as idadresse, T.lbdoss as des_lib, TA.numvoie as des_numvoie, TA.compnumvoie as des_compnumvoie, TA.rue1 as des_rue1, TA.rue2 as des_rue2, TA.rue3 as des_rue3, TA.rue4 as des_rue4, TA.boitepost as des_boitepost, TA.codepostal as des_postal, TA.nomville as des_ville, desapp as des_app, despol as des_pol, TR.nom as rep_nom, TR.prenom as rep_prenom, TG.abregenre as rep_genre, TG.lbgenre as rep_libgenre FROM DOMTIERS T left join TIADRESSE TA on (T.iddoss = TA.idtiers) left join TICTXXCOM TC on (TC.idtiers = T.iddoss) left join TIREPRES TR on (TR.idtiers = T.iddoss and TR.idcompteur = 1) left join TIGENRE TG on (TG.idgenre = TR.genre)
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT T.iddoss as idtiers,TA.idadresse as idadresse, T.lbdoss as des_lib, TA.numvoie as des_numvoie, TA.compnumvoie as des_compnumvoie, TA.rue1 as des_rue1, TA.rue2 as des_rue2, TA.rue3 as des_rue3, TA.rue4 as des_rue4, TA.boitepost as des_boitepost, TA.codepostal as des_postal, TA.nomville as des_ville, desapp as des_app, despol as des_pol, TR.nom as rep_nom, TR.prenom as rep_prenom, TG.abregenre as rep_genre, TG.lbgenre as rep_libgenre FROM DOMTIERS T left join TIADRESSE TA on (T.iddoss = TA.idtiers) left join TICTXXCOM TC on (TC.idtiers = T.iddoss) left join TIREPRES TR on (TR.idtiers = T.iddoss and TR.idcompteur = 1) left join TIGENRE TG on (TG.idgenre = TR.genre)

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT T.iddoss AS idtiers, T.lbdoss AS des_lib, TA.numvoie AS des_numvoie, TA.compnumvoie AS des_compnumvoie, TA.rue1 AS des_rue1, TA.rue2 AS des_rue2, TA.rue3 AS des_rue3, TA.rue4 AS des_rue4, TA.boitepost AS des_boitepost, TA.codepostal AS des_postal, TA.nomville AS des_ville, TC.desapp AS des_app, TC.despol AS des_pol, TR.nom AS rep_nom, TR.prenom AS rep_prenom, TG.abregenre AS rep_genre, TG.lbgenre AS rep_libgenre, TAR.idrepresentant AS idrepresentant FROM DOMTIERS T LEFT JOIN TIADRESSE TA ON (T.iddoss = TA.idtiers and TA.idadresse = 'ADM') LEFT JOIN TICTXXCOM TC ON (TC.idtiers = T.iddoss) LEFT JOIN M82ACTTIEREP_V TAR ON TAR.idtiers=T.iddoss JOIN TIREPRES TR ON (TR.idtiers = TAR.idtiers and TR.idcompteur = TAR.idcompteur) LEFT JOIN TIGENRE TG ON (TG.idgenre = TR.genre)
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT T.iddoss AS idtiers, T.lbdoss AS des_lib, TA.numvoie AS des_numvoie, TA.compnumvoie AS des_compnumvoie, TA.rue1 AS des_rue1, TA.rue2 AS des_rue2, TA.rue3 AS des_rue3, TA.rue4 AS des_rue4, TA.boitepost AS des_boitepost, TA.codepostal AS des_postal, TA.nomville AS des_ville, TC.desapp AS des_app, TC.despol AS des_pol, TR.nom AS rep_nom, TR.prenom AS rep_prenom, TG.abregenre AS rep_genre, TG.lbgenre AS rep_libgenre, TAR.idrepresentant AS idrepresentant FROM DOMTIERS T LEFT JOIN TIADRESSE TA ON (T.iddoss = TA.idtiers and TA.idadresse = 'ADM') LEFT JOIN TICTXXCOM TC ON (TC.idtiers = T.iddoss) LEFT JOIN M82ACTTIEREP_V TAR ON TAR.idtiers=T.iddoss JOIN TIREPRES TR ON (TR.idtiers = TAR.idtiers and TR.idcompteur = TAR.idcompteur) LEFT JOIN TIGENRE TG ON (TG.idgenre = TR.genre)

Vue.SQLSERVER: WITH PARENTS AS ( SELECT DISTINCT BP.id, P.idpere FROM BUDPOSTE BP JOIN PBPOSTE P ON P.id=BP.idposte ) SELECT B.id, BP.idposte, BP.moderpt, CASE WHEN A.idpere IS NULL THEN -1 ELSE 0 END AS isleaf, BP.isleaf AS persistisleaf FROM BUDPOSTE BP JOIN BUDGET B ON BP.id = B.id LEFT JOIN PARENTS A ON A.id=BP.id AND BP.idposte=A.idpere JOIN PBPOSTE P ON BP.idposte = P.id
Vue.ORACLE: WITH PARENTS AS ( SELECT DISTINCT BP.id, P.idpere FROM BUDPOSTE BP JOIN PBPOSTE P ON P.id=BP.idposte ) SELECT B.id, BP.idposte, BP.moderpt, CASE WHEN A.idpere IS NULL THEN -1 ELSE 0 END AS isleaf, BP.isleaf AS persistisleaf FROM BUDPOSTE BP JOIN BUDGET B ON BP.id = B.id LEFT JOIN PARENTS A ON A.id=BP.id AND BP.idposte=A.idpere JOIN PBPOSTE P ON BP.idposte = P.id

Vue.SQLSERVER: WITH OPPROC AS ( SELECT O.iddoss AS idop, P.idproced FROM DOMOPE O JOIN INCOMPUN P ON P.iddom='DOMOPE' AND P.iddoss=O.iddoss AND P.defaut<>0 ), OPPHASES AS ( SELECT O.idop, PE.idphase, PE.isspecial, E.ideventdeb, E.ideventfin FROM OPPROC O JOIN SPOPROCPHASE PE ON O.idproced=PE.idproc JOIN SPOAPPPHASE E ON PE.idphase = E.idphase ), OPPHASESDATES AS ( SELECT E.idop, E.idphase, E.isspecial, DD.dtprev AS dtdebprev, DD.dtreal AS dtdebreal, DF.dtprev AS dtfinprev, DF.dtreal AS dtfinreal FROM OPPHASES E LEFT JOIN SPOAPPEVENTDATE DD ON DD.idop = E.idop AND DD.idev = E.ideventdeb LEFT JOIN SPOAPPEVENTDATE DF ON DF.idop = E.idop AND DF.idev = E.ideventfin ) SELECT E.idop, E.idphase, P.libelle, P.libellecourt, P.codecouleur, E.isspecial, E.dtdebprev AS dtdeb, E.dtfinprev AS dtfin, CASE WHEN E.dtdebprev IS NULL OR E.dtdebprev < '1900/01/01' OR E.dtfinprev IS NULL OR E.dtfinprev < '1900/01/01' OR E.dtfinprev < E.dtdebprev THEN 'EINV' WHEN E.dtfinreal IS NOT NULL AND E.dtfinreal >= '1900/01/01' THEN 'T' WHEN E.dtdebreal IS NOT NULL AND E.dtdebreal >= '1900/01/01' THEN 'C' WHEN E.dtdebreal IS NULL OR E.dtdebreal < '1900/01/01' THEN 'P' ELSE 'E' END AS statut FROM OPPHASESDATES E JOIN SPOAPPPHASE P ON E.idphase=P.idphase
Vue.ORACLE: WITH OPPROC AS ( SELECT O.iddoss AS idop, P.idproced FROM DOMOPE O JOIN INCOMPUN P ON P.iddom='DOMOPE' AND P.iddoss=O.iddoss AND P.defaut<>0 ), OPPHASES AS ( SELECT O.idop, PE.idphase, PE.isspecial, E.ideventdeb, E.ideventfin FROM OPPROC O JOIN SPOPROCPHASE PE ON O.idproced=PE.idproc JOIN SPOAPPPHASE E ON PE.idphase = E.idphase ), OPPHASESDATES AS ( SELECT E.idop, E.idphase, E.isspecial, DD.dtprev AS dtdebprev, DD.dtreal AS dtdebreal, DF.dtprev AS dtfinprev, DF.dtreal AS dtfinreal FROM OPPHASES E LEFT JOIN SPOAPPEVENTDATE DD ON DD.idop = E.idop AND DD.idev = E.ideventdeb LEFT JOIN SPOAPPEVENTDATE DF ON DF.idop = E.idop AND DF.idev = E.ideventfin ) SELECT E.idop, E.idphase, P.libelle, P.libellecourt, P.codecouleur, E.isspecial, E.dtdebprev AS dtdeb, E.dtfinprev AS dtfin, CASE WHEN E.dtdebprev IS NULL OR E.dtdebprev < '1900/01/01' OR E.dtfinprev IS NULL OR E.dtfinprev < '1900/01/01' OR E.dtfinprev < E.dtdebprev THEN 'EINV' WHEN E.dtfinreal IS NOT NULL AND E.dtfinreal >= '1900/01/01' THEN 'T' WHEN E.dtdebreal IS NOT NULL AND E.dtdebreal >= '1900/01/01' THEN 'C' WHEN E.dtdebreal IS NULL OR E.dtdebreal < '1900/01/01' THEN 'P' ELSE 'E' END AS statut FROM OPPHASESDATES E JOIN SPOAPPPHASE P ON E.idphase=P.idphase

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT PG.idproced as idproc, AG.idetape as idetape, DE.lbetape as lbetape, AG.idaction as idaction, DA.lbaction as lbaction FROM INPROCEDGANTT PG JOIN INPROCED P ON PG.idproced=P.idproced AND P.iddom = 'DOMOPE' JOIN INTACHEGANTT TG on TG.idprojet = PG.idprojet AND TG.typetache = 'ACTION_PARAM' JOIN INACTGANTT AG on AG.idprojet = TG.idprojet AND AG.idtache = TG.idtache JOIN INACTION DA on DA.idaction = AG.idaction JOIN INETAPE DE on DE.idetape = AG.idetape UNION SELECT A.idproced as idproc,A.idetape as idetape,E.lbetape as lbetape, A.idaction as idaction,C.lbaction as lbaction FROM INCPETAPI A JOIN INACTION C ON C.idaction = A.idaction JOIN INETAPPI I ON I.iddom = A.iddom and I.idproced = A.idproced and A.idetape = I.idetape JOIN INETAPE E ON E.idetape = I.idetape LEFT JOIN INPROCEDGANTT G ON G.idproced = I.idproced WHERE A.gantt = -1 and G.idproced is null and I.iddom = 'DOMOPE' and I.gantt = -1
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT PG.idproced as idproc, AG.idetape as idetape, DE.lbetape as lbetape, AG.idaction as idaction, DA.lbaction as lbaction FROM INPROCEDGANTT PG JOIN INPROCED P ON PG.idproced=P.idproced AND P.iddom = 'DOMOPE' JOIN INTACHEGANTT TG on TG.idprojet = PG.idprojet AND TG.typetache = 'ACTION_PARAM' JOIN INACTGANTT AG on AG.idprojet = TG.idprojet AND AG.idtache = TG.idtache JOIN INACTION DA on DA.idaction = AG.idaction JOIN INETAPE DE on DE.idetape = AG.idetape UNION SELECT A.idproced as idproc,A.idetape as idetape,E.lbetape as lbetape, A.idaction as idaction,C.lbaction as lbaction FROM INCPETAPI A JOIN INACTION C ON C.idaction = A.idaction JOIN INETAPPI I ON I.iddom = A.iddom and I.idproced = A.idproced and A.idetape = I.idetape JOIN INETAPE E ON E.idetape = I.idetape LEFT JOIN INPROCEDGANTT G ON G.idproced = I.idproced WHERE A.gantt = -1 and G.idproced is null and I.iddom = 'DOMOPE' and I.gantt = -1

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT DISTINCT DG.iddoss as idop, AG.idetape as idetape, DE.lbetape as lbetape FROM INDOSSIERGANTT DG JOIN INTACHEGANTT TG on TG.idprojet = DG.idprojet AND TG.typetache = 'ACTION' AND DG.iddom = 'DOMOPE' JOIN INCPDOSGANTT AG on AG.idprojet = TG.idprojet AND AG.idtache = TG.idtache JOIN INETAPDOS DE on DE.iddom = 'DOMOPE' AND DE.iddoss = DG.iddoss AND DE.idetape = AG.idetape
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT DISTINCT DG.iddoss as idop, AG.idetape as idetape, DE.lbetape as lbetape FROM INDOSSIERGANTT DG JOIN INTACHEGANTT TG on TG.idprojet = DG.idprojet AND TG.typetache = 'ACTION' AND DG.iddom = 'DOMOPE' JOIN INCPDOSGANTT AG on AG.idprojet = TG.idprojet AND AG.idtache = TG.idtache JOIN INETAPDOS DE on DE.iddom = 'DOMOPE' AND DE.iddoss = DG.iddoss AND DE.idetape = AG.idetape

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT DISTINCT PG.idproced as idproc, AG.idetape as idetape, DE.lbetape as lbetape FROM INPROCEDGANTT PG JOIN INPROCED P ON PG.idproced=P.idproced AND P.iddom = 'DOMOPE' JOIN INTACHEGANTT TG on TG.idprojet = PG.idprojet AND TG.typetache = 'ACTION_PARAM' JOIN INACTGANTT AG on AG.idprojet = TG.idprojet AND AG.idtache = TG.idtache JOIN INETAPE DE on DE.idetape = AG.idetape union select DISTINCT I.idproced as idproc,I.idetape as idetape, E.lbetape as lbetape from INETAPPI I JOIN INETAPE E ON E.idetape = I.idetape LEFT JOIN INPROCEDGANTT G ON G.idproced = I.idproced where G.idproced is null and I.iddom = 'DOMOPE' and I.gantt = -1
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT DISTINCT PG.idproced as idproc, AG.idetape as idetape, DE.lbetape as lbetape FROM INPROCEDGANTT PG JOIN INPROCED P ON PG.idproced=P.idproced AND P.iddom = 'DOMOPE' JOIN INTACHEGANTT TG on TG.idprojet = PG.idprojet AND TG.typetache = 'ACTION_PARAM' JOIN INACTGANTT AG on AG.idprojet = TG.idprojet AND AG.idtache = TG.idtache JOIN INETAPE DE on DE.idetape = AG.idetape union select DISTINCT I.idproced as idproc,I.idetape as idetape, E.lbetape as lbetape from INETAPPI I JOIN INETAPE E ON E.idetape = I.idetape LEFT JOIN INPROCEDGANTT G ON G.idproced = I.idproced where G.idproced is null and I.iddom = 'DOMOPE' and I.gantt = -1

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT DG.iddoss as idop, AG.idetape as idetape, DE.lbetape as lbetape, AG.idaction as idaction, DA.lbaction as lbaction FROM INDOSSIERGANTT DG JOIN INTACHEGANTT TG on TG.idprojet = DG.idprojet AND TG.typetache = 'ACTION' AND DG.iddom = 'DOMOPE' JOIN INCPDOSGANTT AG on AG.idprojet = TG.idprojet AND AG.idtache = TG.idtache JOIN INCPDOS DA on DA.iddom = 'DOMOPE' AND DA.iddoss = DG.iddoss AND DA.idaction = AG.idaction JOIN INETAPDOS DE on DE.iddom = 'DOMOPE' AND DE.iddoss = DG.iddoss AND DE.idetape = AG.idetape
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT DG.iddoss as idop, AG.idetape as idetape, DE.lbetape as lbetape, AG.idaction as idaction, DA.lbaction as lbaction FROM INDOSSIERGANTT DG JOIN INTACHEGANTT TG on TG.idprojet = DG.idprojet AND TG.typetache = 'ACTION' AND DG.iddom = 'DOMOPE' JOIN INCPDOSGANTT AG on AG.idprojet = TG.idprojet AND AG.idtache = TG.idtache JOIN INCPDOS DA on DA.iddom = 'DOMOPE' AND DA.iddoss = DG.iddoss AND DA.idaction = AG.idaction JOIN INETAPDOS DE on DE.iddom = 'DOMOPE' AND DE.iddoss = DG.iddoss AND DE.idetape = AG.idetape

Vue.SQLSERVER:
WITH DEFNUM AS ( SELECT O.iddoss AS idop, E.idev, COALESCE(EO.num, EP.num, EG.num) AS num, E.estmultiple FROM DOMOPE O JOIN INCOMPUN P ON P.iddom='DOMOPE' AND P.iddoss=O.iddoss AND P.defaut<>0 JOIN SPOAPPEVENT E ON 1=1 LEFT JOIN EVENTOP EO ON EO.idev=E.idev AND EO.idop = O.iddoss AND EO.idproc IS NULL LEFT JOIN EVENTOP EP ON EP.idev=E.idev AND EP.idop IS NULL AND EP.idproc = P.idproced LEFT JOIN EVENTOP EG ON EG.idev=E.idev AND EG.idop IS NULL AND EG.idproc IS NULL ), NUMFIRSTETAPE AS ( SELECT P.iddoss AS idop, P.idaction, MIN(E.numordre)as num FROM INCPETADOS P JOIN INSETAP E ON E.iddom = P.iddom AND E.iddoss=P.iddoss AND E.idetape = P.idetape WHERE P.iddom='DOMOPE' GROUP BY P.iddoss, P.idaction ), FIRSTETAPE AS ( SELECT P.iddoss AS idop, P.idaction, E.idetape FROM INCPETADOS P JOIN INSETAP E ON E.iddom = P.iddom AND E.iddoss=P.iddoss AND E.idetape = P.idetape JOIN NUMFIRSTETAPE N ON N.idop=P.iddoss AND N.idaction=P.idaction AND E.numordre = N.num ), ALLETAPE AS (SELECT O.iddoss as idop, E.idev, P.idetape, EO.idaction FROM DOMOPE O JOIN SPOAPPEVENT E ON E.estmultiple <> 0 JOIN EVENTOP EO ON EO.idev = E.idev AND EO.idproc IS NULL AND EO.idetape IS NULL AND EO.idop IS NULL JOIN INCPETADOS P ON P.iddoss = O.iddoss AND P.idaction = EO.idaction )
SELECT D.idop, D.idev, COALESCE(F.idetape, P.idetape) AS idetape, COALESCE(F.idaction, P.idaction) AS idaction FROM DEFNUM D LEFT JOIN EVENTOP E ON D.idev=E.idev AND D.num=E.num AND D.estmultiple = 0 LEFT JOIN FIRSTETAPE F ON F.idop=D.idop AND F.idaction=E.idaction AND E.idetape IS NULL LEFT JOIN INCPETADOS P ON P.iddom = 'DOMOPE' AND P.iddoss=D.idop AND P.idetape=E.idetape AND E.idetape IS NOT NULL AND E.idaction = P.idaction UNION SELECT D.idop, D.idev, A.idetape, A.idaction FROM DEFNUM D JOIN ALLETAPE A ON D.estmultiple <> 0 AND A.idop = D.idop AND A.idev=D.idev
Vue.ORACLE:
WITH DEFNUM AS ( SELECT O.iddoss AS idop, E.idev, COALESCE(EO.num, EP.num, EG.num) AS num, E.estmultiple FROM DOMOPE O JOIN INCOMPUN P ON P.iddom='DOMOPE' AND P.iddoss=O.iddoss AND P.defaut<>0 JOIN SPOAPPEVENT E ON 1=1 LEFT JOIN EVENTOP EO ON EO.idev=E.idev AND EO.idop = O.iddoss AND EO.idproc IS NULL LEFT JOIN EVENTOP EP ON EP.idev=E.idev AND EP.idop IS NULL AND EP.idproc = P.idproced LEFT JOIN EVENTOP EG ON EG.idev=E.idev AND EG.idop IS NULL AND EG.idproc IS NULL ), NUMFIRSTETAPE AS ( SELECT P.iddoss AS idop, P.idaction, MIN(E.numordre)as num FROM INCPETADOS P JOIN INSETAP E ON E.iddom = P.iddom AND E.iddoss=P.iddoss AND E.idetape = P.idetape WHERE P.iddom='DOMOPE' GROUP BY P.iddoss, P.idaction ), FIRSTETAPE AS ( SELECT P.iddoss AS idop, P.idaction, E.idetape FROM INCPETADOS P JOIN INSETAP E ON E.iddom = P.iddom AND E.iddoss=P.iddoss AND E.idetape = P.idetape JOIN NUMFIRSTETAPE N ON N.idop=P.iddoss AND N.idaction=P.idaction AND E.numordre = N.num ), ALLETAPE AS (SELECT O.iddoss as idop, E.idev, P.idetape, EO.idaction FROM DOMOPE O JOIN SPOAPPEVENT E ON E.estmultiple <> 0 JOIN EVENTOP EO ON EO.idev = E.idev AND EO.idproc IS NULL AND EO.idetape IS NULL AND EO.idop IS NULL JOIN INCPETADOS P ON P.iddoss = O.iddoss AND P.idaction = EO.idaction )
SELECT D.idop, D.idev, COALESCE(F.idetape, P.idetape) AS idetape, COALESCE(F.idaction, P.idaction) AS idaction FROM DEFNUM D LEFT JOIN EVENTOP E ON D.idev=E.idev AND D.num=E.num AND D.estmultiple = 0 LEFT JOIN FIRSTETAPE F ON F.idop=D.idop AND F.idaction=E.idaction AND E.idetape IS NULL LEFT JOIN INCPETADOS P ON P.iddom = 'DOMOPE' AND P.iddoss=D.idop AND P.idetape=E.idetape AND E.idetape IS NOT NULL AND E.idaction = P.idaction UNION SELECT D.idop, D.idev, A.idetape, A.idaction FROM DEFNUM D JOIN ALLETAPE A ON D.estmultiple <> 0 AND A.idop = D.idop AND A.idev=D.idev

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT D.idop, D.idev,COALESCE(D.idetape,'*') AS idetape, COALESCE(E.dtreal, E.dtprev) AS dtprev, E.dtreal AS dtreal FROM SPOAPPEVENTDEF D LEFT JOIN INELEMDOS E ON E.iddom='DOMOPE' AND E.iddoss=D.idop AND E.idetape=D.idetape AND E.idaction=D.idaction
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT D.idop, D.idev,COALESCE(D.idetape,'*') AS idetape, COALESCE(E.dtreal, E.dtprev) AS dtprev, E.dtreal AS dtreal FROM SPOAPPEVENTDEF D LEFT JOIN INELEMDOS E ON E.iddom='DOMOPE' AND E.iddoss=D.idop AND E.idetape=D.idetape AND E.idaction=D.idaction

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT idcrit1 as iddom, idcrit2 as iddoss, lbclas as lbclassdoss, CI.idclas as idclassdoss FROM INCLASSINFO CI inner join INCLASSEUR C on (C.typclas = CI.typclas and C.idclas = CI.idclas) WHERE CI.typclas = 'DOSSIER' and idcrit3 = '*' and idcrit4 = '*'
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT idcrit1 as iddom, idcrit2 as iddoss, lbclas as lbclassdoss, CI.idclas as idclassdoss FROM INCLASSINFO CI inner join INCLASSEUR C on (C.typclas = CI.typclas and C.idclas = CI.idclas) WHERE CI.typclas = 'DOSSIER' and idcrit3 = '*' and idcrit4 = '*'

Vue.SQLSERVER: WITH TMP_LOGT as ( SELECT P.idop, P.typfin, P.natrv, SUM(PS.nblogt) as nblogt FROM PROG P inner join PROGSYNTH PS on (P.id = PS.id) GROUP BY P.idop, P.typfin, P.natrv ), TMP_LOGTOUV AS ( SELECT P.idop, P.typfin, P.natrv, P.typouv, MAX(P.id) AS idprog, MAX(P.lib) AS libprog, COUNT(P.id) AS countprog, SUM(PL.nbt1) AS nbt1, SUM(PL.nbt1b) AS nbt1b, SUM(PL.nbt2) AS nbt2, SUM(PL.nbt3) AS nbt3, SUM(PL.nbt4) AS nbt4, SUM(PL.nbt5) AS nbt5, SUM(PL.nbt6) AS nbt6, SUM(PL.nbt7) AS nbt7 FROM PROG P INNER JOIN M82PROGLOGT_V PL ON (P.id = PL.idprog) GROUP BY P.idop, P.typfin, P.natrv, P.typouv ), TMP_COLL AS ( SELECT * FROM TMP_LOGTOUV WHERE typouv = 'COLL' ), TMP_IND AS ( SELECT * FROM TMP_LOGTOUV WHERE typouv = 'IND' ) SELECT 'DOMOPE' AS iddom, O.idop AS iddoss, O.typfin, O.natrv, COALESCE(O.nblogt, 0) as nblogt, CASE C.countprog WHEN 1 THEN C.idprog ELSE NULL END AS cdc, CASE C.countprog WHEN 1 THEN C.libprog ELSE NULL END AS libc, COALESCE(C.nbt1, 0) AS c1, COALESCE(C.nbt1b, 0) AS c1b, COALESCE(C.nbt2, 0) AS c2, COALESCE(C.nbt3, 0) AS c3, COALESCE(C.nbt4, 0) AS c4, COALESCE(C.nbt5, 0) AS c5, COALESCE(C.nbt6, 0) AS c6, COALESCE(C.nbt7, 0) AS c7, CASE I.countprog WHEN 1 THEN I.idprog ELSE NULL END AS cdi, CASE I.countprog WHEN 1 THEN I.libprog ELSE NULL END AS libi, COALESCE(I.nbt1, 0) AS i1, COALESCE(I.nbt1b, 0) AS i1b, COALESCE(I.nbt2, 0) AS i2, COALESCE(I.nbt3, 0) AS i3, COALESCE(I.nbt4, 0) AS i4, COALESCE(I.nbt5, 0) AS i5, COALESCE(I.nbt6, 0) AS i6, COALESCE(I.nbt7, 0) AS i7 FROM TMP_LOGT O LEFT JOIN TMP_COLL C ON (O.idop = C.idop and C.typfin = O.typfin and C.natrv = O.natrv) LEFT JOIN TMP_IND I ON (O.idop = I.idop and I.typfin = O.typfin and I.natrv = O.natrv)
Vue.ORACLE: WITH TMP_LOGT as ( SELECT P.idop, P.typfin, P.natrv, SUM(PS.nblogt) as nblogt FROM PROG P inner join PROGSYNTH PS on (P.id = PS.id) GROUP BY P.idop, P.typfin, P.natrv ), TMP_LOGTOUV AS ( SELECT P.idop, P.typfin, P.natrv, P.typouv, MAX(P.id) AS idprog, MAX(P.lib) AS libprog, COUNT(P.id) AS countprog, SUM(PL.nbt1) AS nbt1, SUM(PL.nbt1b) AS nbt1b, SUM(PL.nbt2) AS nbt2, SUM(PL.nbt3) AS nbt3, SUM(PL.nbt4) AS nbt4, SUM(PL.nbt5) AS nbt5, SUM(PL.nbt6) AS nbt6, SUM(PL.nbt7) AS nbt7 FROM PROG P INNER JOIN M82PROGLOGT_V PL ON (P.id = PL.idprog) GROUP BY P.idop, P.typfin, P.natrv, P.typouv ), TMP_COLL AS ( SELECT * FROM TMP_LOGTOUV WHERE typouv = 'COLL' ), TMP_IND AS ( SELECT * FROM TMP_LOGTOUV WHERE typouv = 'IND' ) SELECT 'DOMOPE' AS iddom, O.idop AS iddoss, O.typfin, O.natrv, COALESCE(O.nblogt, 0) as nblogt, CASE C.countprog WHEN 1 THEN C.idprog ELSE NULL END AS cdc, CASE C.countprog WHEN 1 THEN C.libprog ELSE NULL END AS libc, COALESCE(C.nbt1, 0) AS c1, COALESCE(C.nbt1b, 0) AS c1b, COALESCE(C.nbt2, 0) AS c2, COALESCE(C.nbt3, 0) AS c3, COALESCE(C.nbt4, 0) AS c4, COALESCE(C.nbt5, 0) AS c5, COALESCE(C.nbt6, 0) AS c6, COALESCE(C.nbt7, 0) AS c7, CASE I.countprog WHEN 1 THEN I.idprog ELSE NULL END AS cdi, CASE I.countprog WHEN 1 THEN I.libprog ELSE NULL END AS libi, COALESCE(I.nbt1, 0) AS i1, COALESCE(I.nbt1b, 0) AS i1b, COALESCE(I.nbt2, 0) AS i2, COALESCE(I.nbt3, 0) AS i3, COALESCE(I.nbt4, 0) AS i4, COALESCE(I.nbt5, 0) AS i5, COALESCE(I.nbt6, 0) AS i6, COALESCE(I.nbt7, 0) AS i7 FROM TMP_LOGT O LEFT JOIN TMP_COLL C ON (O.idop = C.idop and C.typfin = O.typfin and C.natrv = O.natrv) LEFT JOIN TMP_IND I ON (O.idop = I.idop and I.typfin = O.typfin and I.natrv = O.natrv)

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT id as idprog, sum(nb) as nblotsec, sum(naut) as nbautsec, sum(ncave) as nbcave, sum(ncell) as nbcell, sum(ngarba) as nbgarba, sum(ngarbs) as nbgarbs, sum(ngarpa) as nbgarpa, sum(ngarps) as nbgarps, sum(ngari) as nbgari, sum(ngarni) as nbgarni, sum(nterr) as nbterr, sum(sterr) as suterr, sum(njard) as nbjard, sum(sjard) as sujard FROM ( SELECT id, nb, case typlot when 'AUT' then nb else 0 end as naut, case typlot when 'CAVE' then nb else 0 end as ncave, case typlot when 'CELL' then nb else 0 end as ncell, case typlot when 'GARBA' then nb else 0 end as ngarba, case typlot when 'GARBS' then nb else 0 end as ngarbs, case typlot when 'GARI' then nb else 0 end as ngari, case typlot when 'GARNI' then nb else 0 end as ngarni, case typlot when 'GARPA' then nb else 0 end as ngarpa, case typlot when 'GARPS' then nb else 0 end as ngarps, case typlot when 'TERR' then nb else 0 end as nterr, case typlot when 'TERR' then surface else 0 end as sterr, case typlot when 'JARD' then nb else 0 end as njard, case typlot when 'JARD' then surface else 0 end as sjard FROM PROGLOTSEC) X GROUP BY id

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT id as idprog, sum(rdpt) as nbrdpt, sum(rpref) as nbrpref, sum(rreg) as nbrreg, sum(raggl) as nbraggl, sum(rcoll) as nbrcoll, sum(rcomm) as nbrcomm, sum(raut) as nbraut FROM ( SELECT id, case typreserv when 'DPT' then nblogt else 0 end as rdpt, case typreserv when 'PREF' then nblogt else 0 end as rpref, case typreserv when 'REG' then nblogt else 0 end as rreg, case typreserv when 'AGGL' then nblogt else 0 end as raggl, case typreserv when 'AUT' then nblogt else 0 end as raut, case typreserv when 'COLL' then nblogt else 0 end as rcoll, case typreserv when 'COMM' then nblogt else 0 end as rcomm FROM PROGRESERV) X GROUP BY id

Vue.SQLSERVER: WITH PROGTERCNT AS ( SELECT P.idop AS idop, COUNT(P.typouv) AS typouvcnt, MAX(P.id) AS idter, MAX(P.lib) AS libter FROM PROG P WHERE P.typouv='TER' GROUP BY P.idop, P.typouv ), DISTINCTNIVLIV AS ( SELECT DISTINCT P.idop AS idop, P.nivliv as nivliv FROM PROG P WHERE P.typouv='TER' ), NIVLIVCNT AS ( SELECT NC.idop, COUNT(NC.nivliv) AS nivlivcnt, MAX(NC.nivliv) AS nivliv FROM DISTINCTNIVLIV NC GROUP BY NC.idop ), DISTINCTDEST AS ( SELECT DISTINCT P.idop AS idop, P.activite as activite FROM PROG P WHERE P.typouv='TER' ), DESTCNT AS ( SELECT DC.idop as idop, COUNT(DC.activite) AS destcnt, MAX(DC.activite) AS dest FROM DISTINCTDEST DC GROUP BY DC.idop ), PROGTER AS ( SELECT P.*, CASE C.typouvcnt WHEN 1 THEN C.idter ELSE NULL END AS idter, CASE C.typouvcnt WHEN 1 THEN C.libter ELSE NULL END AS libter, PS.su AS ltsurfutil, PS.nblotp AS ltnbc, CASE NC.nivlivcnt WHEN 1 THEN NC.nivliv ELSE NULL END AS ltnivliv, '' AS ltstat, '' AS ltannexe, CASE DC.destcnt WHEN 1 THEN DC.dest ELSE NULL END AS ltdest, PS.shon AS ltshon, PS.shob AS ltshob FROM PROG P LEFT JOIN PROGSYNTH PS ON(P.id=PS.id) LEFT JOIN NIVLIVCNT NC ON(P.idop=NC.idop) LEFT JOIN PROGTERCNT C ON (P.idop = C.idop) LEFT JOIN DESTCNT DC ON (P.idop=DC.idop) WHERE P.typouv='TER' ) SELECT 'DOMOPE' AS iddom, O.iddoss AS iddoss, MAX(O.lbdoss) AS ltlib, coalesce(SUM(P.ltsurfutil), 0) AS ltsurfutil, coalesce(SUM(P.ltnbc), 0) AS ltnbc, MAX(P.ltnivliv) AS ltnivliv, MAX(P.ltstat) AS ltstat, MAX(P.ltannexe) AS ltannexe, MAX(P.ltdest) AS ltdest, coalesce(SUM(P.ltshon), 0) AS ltshon, coalesce(SUM(P.ltshob), 0) AS ltshob FROM DOMOPE O LEFT JOIN PROGTER P ON(O.iddoss=P.idop) GROUP BY O.iddoss

Vue.SQLSERVER: WITH PROGCOMCNT AS ( SELECT P.idop AS idop, COUNT(P.typouv) AS typouvcnt, MAX(P.id) AS idcom, MAX(P.lib) AS libcom FROM PROG P WHERE P.typouv='COM' GROUP BY P.idop, P.typouv ), DISTINCTNIVLIV AS ( SELECT DISTINCT P.idop AS idop, P.nivliv as nivliv FROM PROG P WHERE P.typouv='COM' ), NIVLIVCNT AS ( SELECT NC.idop, COUNT(NC.nivliv) AS nivlivcnt, MAX(NC.nivliv) AS nivliv FROM DISTINCTNIVLIV NC GROUP BY NC.idop ), DISTINCTDEST AS ( SELECT DISTINCT P.idop AS idop, P.activite as activite FROM PROG P WHERE P.typouv='COM' ), DESTCNT AS ( SELECT DC.idop as idop, COUNT(DC.activite) AS destcnt, MAX(DC.activite) AS dest FROM DISTINCTDEST DC GROUP BY DC.idop ), PROGCOM AS ( SELECT P.*, CASE C.typouvcnt WHEN 1 THEN C.idcom ELSE NULL END AS idcom, CASE C.typouvcnt WHEN 1 THEN C.libcom ELSE NULL END AS libcom, PS.su AS ltsurfutil, PS.nblotp AS ltnbc, CASE NC.nivlivcnt WHEN 1 THEN NC.nivliv ELSE NULL END AS ltnivliv, '' AS ltstat, '' AS ltannexe, CASE DC.destcnt WHEN 1 THEN DC.dest ELSE NULL END AS ltdest, PS.shon AS ltshon, PS.shob AS ltshob FROM PROG P LEFT JOIN PROGSYNTH PS ON(P.id=PS.id) LEFT JOIN NIVLIVCNT NC ON(P.idop=NC.idop) LEFT JOIN PROGCOMCNT C ON (P.idop = C.idop) LEFT JOIN DESTCNT DC ON (P.idop=DC.idop) WHERE P.typouv='COM' ) SELECT 'DOMOPE' AS iddom, O.iddoss AS iddoss, MAX(O.lbdoss) AS lclib, MAX(P.idcom) AS lccp, MAX(P.libcom) AS lclp, coalesce(SUM(P.ltsurfutil), 0) AS lcsurfutil, coalesce(SUM(P.ltnbc), 0) AS lcnbc, MAX(P.ltnivliv) AS lcnivliv, MAX(P.ltstat) AS lcstat, MAX(P.ltannexe) AS lcannexe, MAX(P.ltdest) AS lcdest, coalesce(SUM(P.ltshon), 0) AS lcshon, coalesce(SUM(P.ltshob), 0) AS lcshob FROM DOMOPE O LEFT JOIN PROGCOM P ON(O.iddoss=P.idop) GROUP BY O.iddoss

garaer, coalesce(O.bxss, 0) AS bxss, coalesce(O.nbxss, 0) AS nbxss, coalesce(O.nbloghp, 0) AS nbloghp, coalesce(O.nbloghp1, 0) AS nbloghp1, coalesce(O.nbloghp1b, 0) AS nbloghp1b, coalesce(O.nbloghp2, WITH PROGEQCNT AS ( SELECT P.idop AS idop, COUNT(P.typouv) AS typouvcnt, MAX(P.id) AS ideq, MAX(P.lib) AS libeq FROM PROG P WHERE P.typouv='EQPUB' GROUP BY P.idop, P.typouv ), DISTINCTNIVLIV AS ( SELECT DISTINCT P.idop AS idop, P.nivliv as nivliv FROM PROG P WHERE P.typouv='EQPUB' ), NIVLIVCNT AS ( SELECT NC.idop, COUNT(NC.nivliv) AS nivlivcnt, MAX(NC.nivliv) AS nivliv FROM DISTINCTNIVLIV NC GROUP BY NC.idop ), DISTINCTDEST AS ( SELECT DISTINCT P.idop AS idop, P.activite as activite FROM PROG P WHERE P.typouv='EQPUB' ), DESTCNT AS ( SELECT DC.idop as idop, COUNT(DC.activite) AS destcnt, MAX(DC.activite) AS dest FROM DISTINCTDEST DC GROUP BY DC.idop ), DISTINCTMODINTERV AS ( SELECT DISTINCT P.idop AS idop, P.modinterv as modinterv FROM PROG P WHERE P.typouv='EQPUB'
), MODINTERVCNT AS ( SELECT MC.idop as idop, COUNT(MC.modinterv) AS modintervcnt, MAX(MC.modinterv) AS modinterv FROM DISTINCTMODINTERV MC GROUP BY MC.idop ), PROGEQ AS ( SELECT P.*, CASE C.typouvcnt WHEN 1 THEN C.ideq ELSE NULL END AS ideq, CASE C.typouvcnt WHEN 1 THEN C.libeq ELSE NULL END AS libeq, PS.su AS ltsurfutil, CASE NC.nivlivcnt WHEN 1 THEN NC.nivliv ELSE NULL END AS ltnivliv, '' AS ltstat, '' AS ltannexe, CASE DC.destcnt WHEN 1 THEN DC.dest ELSE NULL END AS ltdest, CASE MC.modintervcnt WHEN 1 THEN MC.modinterv ELSE NULL END AS ltmodinterv, PS.shon AS ltshon, PS.shob AS ltshob FROM PROG P LEFT JOIN PROGSYNTH PS ON(P.id=PS.id) LEFT JOIN NIVLIVCNT NC ON(P.idop=NC.idop) LEFT JOIN PROGEQCNT C ON (P.idop = C.idop) LEFT JOIN DESTCNT DC ON (P.idop=DC.idop) LEFT JOIN MODINTERVCNT MC ON (P.idop=MC.idop) WHERE P.typouv='EQPUB' ) SELECT 'DOMOPE' AS iddom, O.iddoss AS iddoss, MAX(O.lbdoss) AS eplib, coalesce(SUM(P.ltsurfutil), 0) AS epsurfutil, MAX(P.ltnivliv) AS epnivliv, MAX(P.ltstat) AS epstat, MAX(P.ltannexe) AS epannexe, MAX(P.ltdest) AS epdest, MAX(P.ltmodinterv) AS lcinterv, coalesce(SUM(P.ltshon), 0) AS epshon, coalesce(SUM(P.ltshob), 0) AS epshob FROM DOMOPE O LEFT JOIN PROGEQ P ON(O.iddoss=P.idop) GROUP BY O.iddoss

), MODINTERVCNT AS ( SELECT MC.idop as idop, COUNT(MC.modinterv) AS modintervcnt, MAX(MC.modinterv) AS modinterv FROM DISTINCTMODINTERV MC GROUP BY MC.idop ), PROGEQ AS ( SELECT P.*, CASE C.typouvcnt WHEN 1 THEN C.ideq ELSE NULL END AS ideq, CASE C.typouvcnt WHEN 1 THEN C.libeq ELSE NULL END AS libeq, PS.su AS ltsurfutil, CASE NC.nivlivcnt WHEN 1 THEN NC.nivliv ELSE NULL END AS ltnivliv, '' AS ltstat, '' AS ltannexe, CASE DC.destcnt WHEN 1 THEN DC.dest ELSE NULL END AS ltdest, CASE MC.modintervcnt WHEN 1 THEN MC.modinterv ELSE NULL END AS ltmodinterv, PS.shon AS ltshon, PS.shob AS ltshob FROM PROG P LEFT JOIN PROGSYNTH PS ON(P.id=PS.id) LEFT JOIN NIVLIVCNT NC ON(P.idop=NC.idop) LEFT JOIN PROGEQCNT C ON (P.idop = C.idop) LEFT JOIN DESTCNT DC ON (P.idop=DC.idop) LEFT JOIN MODINTERVCNT MC ON (P.idop=MC.idop) WHERE P.typouv='EQPUB' ) SELECT 'DOMOPE' AS iddom, O.iddoss AS iddoss, MAX(O.lbdoss) AS eplib, coalesce(SUM(P.ltsurfutil), 0) AS epsurfutil, MAX(P.ltnivliv) AS epnivliv, MAX(P.ltstat) AS epstat, MAX(P.ltannexe) AS epannexe, MAX(P.ltdest) AS epdest, MAX(P.ltmodinterv) AS lcinterv, coalesce(SUM(P.ltshon), 0) AS epshon, coalesce(SUM(P.ltshob), 0) AS epshob FROM DOMOPE O LEFT JOIN PROGEQ P ON(O.iddoss=P.idop) GROUP BY O.iddoss

Vue.SQLSERVER: WITH POSTE as ( select id,typstruct from PBPOSTE ), OPE as ( select D.iddoss,D.exportgf,D.importpaie,O.istreso from DYNBSOPE D join DOMOPE O ON D.iddoss = O.iddoss where istreso = -1 ), PAR_OPE as ( select E.idop ,'*' as idprog ,E.idpostetreso as idposte ,sum(E.mnt) as mnt ,E.dateEch as dateflux ,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso ,E.idregletreso as idpiece ,null as libpiece ,E.dateEch as datepiece from EcheanceTreso E join OPE on OPE.iddoss = E.idop LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = E.idop and P0.idposte = E.idpostetreso and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = E.idop and P1.idposte = E.idpostetreso where E.typeposte= 'BUD' group by E.idop,E.idpostetreso,E.dateEch,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) ,E.idregletreso ), PAR_PROG as ( select E.idop ,E.idprog ,E.idpostetreso as idposte ,E.mnt as mnt ,E.dateEch as dateflux ,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso ,E.idregletreso as idpiece ,null as libpiece ,E.dateEch as datepiece from EcheanceTreso E join OPE on OPE.iddoss = E.idop LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = E.idop and P0.idposte = E.idpostetreso and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = E.idop and P1.idposte = E.idpostetreso where E.typeposte= 'BUD' ) select PAR_OPE.* ,POSTE.typstruct from PAR_OPE JOIN POSTE ON POSTE.id = PAR_OPE.idposte UNION select PAR_PROG.* , POSTE.typstruct from PAR_PROG JOIN POSTE ON POSTE.id = PAR_PROG.idposte
Vue.ORACLE: WITH POSTE as ( select id,typstruct from PBPOSTE ), OPE as ( select D.iddoss,D.exportgf,D.importpaie,O.istreso from DYNBSOPE D join DOMOPE O ON D.iddoss = O.iddoss where istreso = -1 ), PAR_OPE as ( select E.idop ,'*' as idprog ,E.idpostetreso as idposte ,sum(E.mnt) as mnt ,E.dateEch as dateflux ,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso ,E.idregletreso as idpiece ,null as libpiece ,E.dateEch as datepiece from EcheanceTreso E join OPE on OPE.iddoss = E.idop LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = E.idop and P0.idposte = E.idpostetreso and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = E.idop and P1.idposte = E.idpostetreso where E.typeposte= 'BUD' group by E.idop,E.idpostetreso,E.dateEch,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) ,E.idregletreso ), PAR_PROG as ( select E.idop ,E.idprog ,E.idpostetreso as idposte ,E.mnt as mnt ,E.dateEch as dateflux ,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso ,E.idregletreso as idpiece ,null as libpiece ,E.dateEch as datepiece from EcheanceTreso E join OPE on OPE.iddoss = E.idop LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = E.idop and P0.idposte = E.idpostetreso and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = E.idop and P1.idposte = E.idpostetreso where E.typeposte= 'BUD' ) select PAR_OPE.* ,POSTE.typstruct from PAR_OPE JOIN POSTE ON POSTE.id = PAR_OPE.idposte UNION select PAR_PROG.* , POSTE.typstruct from PAR_PROG JOIN POSTE ON POSTE.id = PAR_PROG.idposte

WITH AV as ( SELECT D.idop ,D.idprog ,A.ac ,A.dtprever ,D.iddoss ,COALESCE(A.mntac,0) as mnt FROM DOMOPEFIN D JOIN FINDEMAC A ON (A.iddoss = D.iddoss) WHERE D.idprog is not null and D.idprog <>'*' ) , DEMAC AS ( select idop,idprog,ac,dtprever,iddoss,mnt from AV union select idop,'*',ac,dtprever,iddoss,mnt from AV ),
DOMOPF as ( SELECT iddoss,idop,idposte,lbdoss,dtdem FROM DOMOPEFIN where idprog is null OR idprog = '*' ), ACOMPTE AS ( select valeur,lbval from INVAL where idcodif= 'FiLibAcompte' ), PROGRAMME AS ( SELECT id, idop FROM PROG UNION SELECT '*', PROG.idop FROM PROG ), BUD AS ( SELECT id, idop, typbud, soc FROM BUDGET WHERE typbud = 0 ), MONTANTBUD AS ( SELECT id , idposte , idprog , mntttc FROM BUDMONTANT )
SELECT BUD.idop ,PROGRAMME.id as idprog ,MONTANTBUD.idposte ,CASE WHEN (M.mntttc > 0) THEN ROUND((F.mntac * ROUND((MONTANTBUD.mntttc/M.mntttc),2)),2) ELSE 0 END as mnt ,F.dtprever as dateflux ,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso ,F.iddoss as idpiece ,D.lbdoss as libpiece ,D.dtdem as datepiece ,A.lbval as acompte FROM FINDEMAC F JOIN DOMOPF D ON (D.iddoss = F.iddoss) LEFT JOIN ACOMPTE A ON A.valeur = F.ac JOIN BUD ON (BUD.idop = D.idop) JOIN PROGRAMME ON (PROGRAMME.idop = D.idop) JOIN MONTANTBUD ON (montantbud.id = BUD.id and MONTANTBUD.idposte = D.idposte and MONTANTBUD.idprog = PROGRAMME.id) JOIN MONTANTBUD M ON (M.id = BUD.id and M.idposte = D.idposte and M.idprog = '*') LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = D.idop and P0.idposte = D.idposte and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = D.idop and P1.idposte = D.idposte UNION ALL SELECT A.idop, A.idprog, A.idposte, A.mntht as mnt, OD.dateod as dateflux, COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso, OD.id as idpiece, OD.lib as libpiece, OD.dateod as datepice, null as acompte FROM MCAFFECBUD A JOIN MCOD OD ON OD.id = A.idfact and OD.typeod = 'ODFIN' LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = A.idop and P0.idposte = A.idposte and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = A.idop and P1.idposte = A.idposte where A.typemnt = 'E' UNION select V.idop ,V.idprog ,F.idposte ,coalesce(V.mnt,0) as mnt ,V.dtprever as dateflux ,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso ,V.iddoss as idpiece ,F.lbdoss as libpiece ,F.dtdem as datepiece ,AC.lbval as acompte FROM DEMAC V LEFT JOIN DOMOPEFIN F ON F.iddoss = V.iddoss LEFT JOIN ACOMPTE AC ON AC.valeur = V.ac LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = V.idop and P0.idposte = F.idposte and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = V.idop and P1.idposte = F.idposte

SELECT BUD.idop ,PROGRAMME.id as idprog ,MONTANTBUD.idposte ,CASE WHEN (M.mntttc > 0) THEN ROUND((F.mntac * ROUND((MONTANTBUD.mntttc/M.mntttc),2)),2) ELSE 0 END as mnt ,F.dtprever as dateflux ,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso ,F.iddoss as idpiece ,D.lbdoss as libpiece ,D.dtdem as datepiece ,A.lbval as acompte FROM FINDEMAC F JOIN DOMOPF D ON (D.iddoss = F.iddoss) LEFT JOIN ACOMPTE A ON A.valeur = F.ac JOIN BUD ON (BUD.idop = D.idop) JOIN PROGRAMME ON (PROGRAMME.idop = D.idop) JOIN MONTANTBUD ON (montantbud.id = BUD.id and MONTANTBUD.idposte = D.idposte and MONTANTBUD.idprog = PROGRAMME.id) JOIN MONTANTBUD M ON (M.id = BUD.id and M.idposte = D.idposte and M.idprog = '*') LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = D.idop and P0.idposte = D.idposte and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = D.idop and P1.idposte = D.idposte UNION ALL SELECT A.idop, A.idprog, A.idposte, A.mntht as mnt, OD.dateod as dateflux, COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso, OD.id as idpiece, OD.lib as libpiece, OD.dateod as datepice, null as acompte FROM MCAFFECBUD A JOIN MCOD OD ON OD.id = A.idfact and OD.typeod = 'ODFIN' LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = A.idop and P0.idposte = A.idposte and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = A.idop and P1.idposte = A.idposte where A.typemnt = 'E' UNION select V.idop ,V.idprog ,F.idposte ,coalesce(V.mnt,0) as mnt ,V.dtprever as dateflux ,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso ,V.iddoss as idpiece ,F.lbdoss as libpiece ,F.dtdem as datepiece ,AC.lbval as acompte FROM DEMAC V LEFT JOIN DOMOPEFIN F ON F.iddoss = V.iddoss LEFT JOIN ACOMPTE AC ON AC.valeur = V.ac LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = V.idop and P0.idposte = F.idposte and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = V.idop and P1.idposte = F.idposte

SELECT id, idop, typbud, soc FROM BUDGET WHERE typbud = 0 ), ACOMPTE AS ( select valeur,lbval from INVAL where idcodif= 'FiLibAcompte' ), MONTANTBUD AS ( SELECT id , idposte , idprog , mntttc FROM BUDMONTANT ) SELECT BUD.idop ,PROGRAMME.id as idprog ,MONTANTBUD.idposte ,CASE WHEN (M.mntttc > 0) THEN ROUND((A.mnt * ROUND((MONTANTBUD.mntttc/M.mntttc),2)),2) ELSE 0 END as mnt ,F.dtver as dateflux ,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso ,D.iddoss as idpiece ,D.lbdoss as libpiece ,D.dtdem as datepiece ,AC.lbval as acompte FROM FINVERSEMAC A JOIN FINVERSEM F ON (F.iddoss = A.iddoss and F.refver = A.refver) JOIN DOMOPF D ON (D.iddoss = F.iddoss) LEFT JOIN ACOMPTE AC ON AC.valeur = A.ac JOIN BUD ON (BUD.idop = D.idop) JOIN PROGRAMME ON (PROGRAMME.idop = D.idop) JOIN MONTANTBUD ON (montantbud.id = BUD.id and MONTANTBUD.idposte = D.idposte and MONTANTBUD.idprog = PROGRAMME.id) JOIN MONTANTBUD M ON (M.id = BUD.id and M.idposte = D.idposte and M.idprog = '*') LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = D.idop and P0.idposte = D.idposte and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = D.idop and P1.idposte = D.idposte UNION SELECT A.idop, A.idprog, A.idposte, A.mntht as mnt, OD.dateod as dateflux, COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso, OD.id as idpiece, OD.lib as libpiece, OD.dateod as datepice, null as acompte FROM MCAFFECBUD A JOIN MCOD OD ON OD.id = A.idfact and OD.typeod = 'ODFIN' LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = A.idop and P0.idposte = A.idposte and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = A.idop and P1.idposte = A.idposte where A.typemnt = 'F' UNION select V.idop ,V.idprog ,F.idposte ,coalesce(V.mnt,0) as mnt ,V.dtver as dateflux ,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso ,V.iddoss as idpiece ,F.lbdoss as libpiece ,F.dtdem as datepiece ,AC.lbval as acompte FROM VERS V LEFT JOIN DOMOPEFIN F ON F.iddoss = V.iddoss LEFT JOIN ACOMPTE AC ON AC.valeur = V.ac LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = V.idop and P0.idposte = F.idposte and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = V.idop and P1.idposte = F.idposte

WITH OPE as ( select D.iddoss,D.exportgf,D.importpaie,O.istreso from DYNBSOPE D join DOMOPE O ON D.iddoss = O.iddoss where istreso = -1 ), RETENU as ( select idfact,idposte,idprog,sum(CASE WHEN (typemnt = 'AV') THEN -mntttc ELSE mntttc END ) ret from MCAFFECCPTA group by idfact,idposte,idprog union select idfact,idposte,'*',sum(CASE WHEN (typemnt = 'AV') THEN -mntttc ELSE mntttc END ) ret from MCAFFECCPTA group by idfact,idposte ), S_IMP as ( select idop,'*' as idprog ,idposte,SUM(mntttc) as mntht,dtcompta as dateflux ,numfact as idpiece,lib as libpiece ,dtimport as datepiece from MCIMPORTGF join OPE on OPE.iddoss = MCIMPORTGF.idop where typenreg = 'F' and OPE.exportgf=0 and dtcompta <= CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),111) group by idop,idposte,dtcompta,numfact,lib,dtimport ), IMP as ( select I.idop ,I.idprog ,I.idposte ,I.mntttc ,I.dtcompta as dateflux ,I.numfact as idpiece ,I.lib as libpiece ,I.dtimport as datepiece from MCIMPORTGF I JOIN OPE O ON O.iddoss = I.idop WHERE I.typenreg = 'F' and O.exportgf=0 union select * from S_IMP ), FAC as ( select A.idop ,A.idprog ,A.idposte ,A.mntttc - COALESCE(R.ret,0) as mntttc ,COALESCE(S.dtpaie,F.dtpaie,OD.dateod,A.dtcompta) as dateflux ,A.idfact as idpiece ,COALESCE(S.lib,F.lib,OD.lib,FI.libelle) as libpiece ,COALESCE(S.dtsitu,F.dtfact,OD.dateod,FI.dateFin) as datepiece ,COALESCE(F.type,'D') as type from MCAFFECBUD A join OPE O on O.iddoss = A.idop left outer join MCFACTMNT FM On FM.idmnt = A.idmnt left outer JOIN MCFACTURE F ON F.idfact = FM.idfact left outer join MCSITUATION S ON S.idsitu = A.idfact left outer join MCOD OD ON OD.id = A.idfact left outer JOIN CPFraisFi FI ON FI.code = A.idcontrat left outer join RETENU R ON R.idfact = A.idfact and R.idposte = A.idposte and R.idprog = A.idprog WHERE A.typemnt in ('F','A') and O.exportgf=-1 and (CASE WHEN (FI.id IS NOT NULL) THEN A.dtcompta WHEN (OD.id IS NOT NULL) THEN OD.dateod WHEN (S.idsitu IS null) THEN F.dtpaie ELSE S.dtpaie END) is not null and (CASE WHEN (FI.id IS NOT NULL) THEN A.dtcompta WHEN (OD.id IS NOT NULL) THEN OD.dateod WHEN (S.idsitu IS null) THEN F.dtpaie ELSE S.dtpaie END) <= CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),111) and (CASE WHEN (OD.id IS NOT NULL) THEN OD.dateannul WHEN (S.idsitu IS null) THEN F.dtannul ELSE S.dtannul END is null) )
select IMP.idop ,IMP.idprog ,IMP.idposte ,IMP.mntttc as mnt ,IMP.dateflux as dateflux ,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso ,IMP.idpiece ,IMP.libpiece ,IMP.datepiece ,'D' as type from IMP LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = IMP.idop and P0.idposte = IMP.idposte and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = IMP.idop and P1.idposte = IMP.idposte Union select FAC.idop ,FAC.idprog ,FAC.idposte ,FAC.mntttc as mnt ,FAC.dateflux as dateflux ,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso ,FAC.idpiece ,FAC.libpiece ,FAC.datepiece ,FAC.type from FAC LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = FAC.idop and P0.idposte = FAC.idposte and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = FAC.idop and P1.idposte = FAC.idposte

COALESCE(R.ret,0) as mntttc ,COALESCE(S.dtpaie,F.dtpaie,OD.dateod,A.dtcompta) as dateflux ,A.idfact as idpiece ,COALESCE(S.lib,F.lib,OD.lib,FI.libelle) as libpiece ,COALESCE(S.dtsitu,F.dtfact,OD.dateod,FI.dateFin) as datepiece ,COALESCE(F.type,'D') as type from MCAFFECBUD A join OPE O on O.iddoss = A.idop left outer join MCFACTMNT FM On FM.idmnt = A.idmnt left outer JOIN MCFACTURE F ON F.idfact = FM.idfact left outer join MCSITUATION S ON S.idsitu = A.idfact left outer join MCOD OD ON OD.id = A.idfact left outer JOIN CPFraisFi FI ON FI.code = A.idcontrat left outer join RETENU R ON R.idfact = A.idfact and R.idposte = A.idposte and R.idprog = A.idprog WHERE A.typemnt in ('F','A') and O.exportgf=-1 and (CASE WHEN (FI.id IS NOT NULL) THEN A.dtcompta WHEN (OD.id IS NOT NULL) THEN OD.dateod WHEN (S.idsitu IS null) THEN F.dtpaie ELSE S.dtpaie END) is not null and (CASE WHEN (FI.id IS NOT NULL) THEN A.dtcompta WHEN (OD.id IS NOT NULL) THEN OD.dateod WHEN (S.idsitu IS null) THEN F.dtpaie ELSE S.dtpaie END) <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') and (CASE WHEN (OD.id IS NOT NULL) THEN OD.dateannul WHEN (S.idsitu IS null) THEN F.dtannul ELSE S.dtannul END is null) ) select IMP.idop ,IMP.idprog ,IMP.idposte ,IMP.mntttc as mnt ,IMP.dateflux as dateflux ,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso ,IMP.idpiece ,IMP.libpiece ,IMP.datepiece ,'D' as type from IMP LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = IMP.idop and P0.idposte = IMP.idposte and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = IMP.idop and P1.idposte = IMP.idposte Union select FAC.idop ,FAC.idprog ,FAC.idposte ,FAC.mntttc as mnt ,FAC.dateflux as dateflux ,COALESCE(P0.idpostetreso,P1.idpostetreso) as idpostetreso ,FAC.idpiece ,FAC.libpiece ,FAC.datepiece ,FAC.type from FAC LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P0 ON P0.idop = FAC.idop and P0.idposte = FAC.idposte and P0.estsaisie = -1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSOPOSTETRESOOP P1 ON P1.idop = FAC.idop and P1.idposte = FAC.idposte
